# screenHeight

**Instance Property**

The height of the screen mesh, in meters, when the image is presented in a non-immersive viewing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var screenHeight: Float
```

## Retrieving the current screen mesh size

- **presentationScreenSize**: The size of the screen presenting the image, with the format [width, height] in meters.
